section.name: TextBlockGoogleStyleFormatting
section.subsection:
Checks correct format of Java Text Blocks as specified in
Google Java Style Guide.
This Check performs two validations:
It ensures that the opening and closing text-block quotes (""") each appear on their own line, with no other item preceding them.
Opening and closing quotes are vertically aligned.
Note: Closing quotes can be followed by additional code on the same line.
